Apple’s Silicon Engineering Group (SEG) is hiring hardworking engineers for CPU block-level physical design.
description:
As a CPU Physical Design Engineer you will drive or participate in the following:
-  Drive RTL-to-GDS design convergence through logic synthesis and place-and-route tools targeting ambitious PPA goals
-  Will be responsible for block-level physical design delivery along with closure of backend flows, electrical requirements and improving silicon yield
-  Will work closely with internal CAD and PD methodology teams on industry standard synthesis/PNR tool features and optimizations and their adoption in CPU design
-  Will work with x-functional top-level teams on the aspects of CPU floorplan, timing, power, reliability, and testability
-  Will work closely with custom IP teams to define and co-optimize memory macros, library standard cells to improve design PPA
key_qualifications:
Minimum BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience
Solid electrical engineering fundamentals in digital circuits, timing/power concepts, and basics of logic design
Experienced in using industry standard logic Synthesis, PnR, STA and Power analysis tools along with floor-planing, pin-placement and timing budgeting knowledge
Familiar with programming and scripting (Perl, TCL) with strong fundamentals
Ability to work well in a team, self-motivated and excellent communication skills
education_experience: Minimum BS and 3+ years of relevant industry experience
